name: mcp-manager
title: MCP Manager 설명
description: A comprehensive MCP file management tool for AI development. Create, edit, and apply MCP configurations for both Cursor and Claude. Features include JSON file creation, template management, and seamless integration with AI development workflows.
author: yeeed711

commands.name: index
commands.title: MCP Manager
commands.description: Manage MCP configurations for AI development

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
